:::: {.callout-important}
## How to customize the Preface page

- To modify the preface text, edit the `content/0.2_preface.qmd` file.
- To add an author to the preface, add the author's name to the `authors` list
  in the YAML header of the `0.2_preface.qmd` file.
  For example:
```yaml
authors:
    - name: Ima Author
```
- To remove the preface section, edit the `_quarto.yml` file and remove the
  `- content/0.2_preface.qmd` line.

**To hide these instructions on all pages, set `show-instructions: false`
in the `_quarto.yml` file.**
::::
